name: Giveback
tagline: Transparent Disaster Relief & Charity Platform for Vietnam
description: A comprehensive platform supporting charitable donations for disaster-affected areas in Vietnam. The system manages charity campaigns, processes user donations, and provides transparent reports on fund utilization, ensuring transparency and efficiency in donation management and fund distribution.

responsibilities: Designed and developed complete charity campaign management system
Built donation processing system with ZaloPay payment integration
Implemented multi-role authentication system (Admin, Charity, Donor, Beneficiary)
Created charity verification system with license validation workflow
Built real-time disaster news feed and heatmap for affected areas
Developed comprehensive reporting system with PDF/Excel export functionality

features: Multi-role User Management (Admin, Charity, Donor, Beneficiary)
